A

action(Player) - Method in class mvc.model.cards.Card
A method that all subclasses inherit and implements the action of every card
action(Player) - Method in class mvc.model.cards.DealCard
Postcondition:
if player buys the card, adds the card into his cardlist, otherwise to the AllCardsStack
action(Player) - Method in class mvc.model.cards.MailCard
the action that all MailCards inherit
action(Player) - Method in class mvc.model.cards.mailcards.Bill
Adds the bill's value to the bills balance of the player
action(Player, Jackpot) - Method in class mvc.model.cards.mailcards.Charity
Moves balance from a player to the Jackpot balance Postcondition:
balance is added to Jackpot
action(Player, Position[]) - Method in class mvc.model.cards.mailcards.MoveToDealBuyer
Moves to the closest Deal or Buyer position Postcondition:
if there is a deal or buyer position then player moves there
action(Player) - Method in class mvc.model.cards.mailcards.PayTheNeighbor
Postcondition:
transfers money from a player to the other
action(Player) - Method in class mvc.model.cards.mailcards.TakeFromNeighbor
Postcondition:
transfers money from a player to the other
action(Player, Jackpot) - Method in class mvc.model.position.FamilyCasino
Observer:
if player's dice is an odd number, then player give money into the jackpot if player's dice is an even number, the player takes money from the jackpot
action(Player, int, int) - Method in class mvc.model.position.PayDayPosition
Mutative Transformer:
In this position the player must do all the actions of the PayDay!
action(Player, int) - Method in class mvc.model.position.Sweepstakes
Mutative Transformer:
if player is on this position wins dice number multiplied by 1000
action(Player, int, DealCard) - Method in class mvc.model.position.YardSale
Mutative Transformer:
The player pays 100*the dice number and takes a DealCard from the DealCard Stack
Advertisement - Class in mvc.model.cards.mailcards
 
Advertisement(String, String) - Constructor for class mvc.model.cards.mailcards.Advertisement
Constructor:
instantiates a new Advertisement card Postcondition:
instantiates a new Advertisement card with cost value = 0
AllCardsStack - Class in mvc.model.cards
 
AllCardsStack() - Constructor for class mvc.model.cards.AllCardsStack
Constructor:
instantiates a new stack for all the cards Postcondition:
creates an empty Arraylist
